request.description: Updates riskLevel, threatLevel, recordStatus, hostZone, and location on one or multiple networks. The operation is valid for existing networks only. Ignores update request if the value change requested is for a Network that does not exist or to which the user doesn't have permissions.

response.name: Returns Networks fields updated with new values. Provides additional information in the response body if errors occurred.

query.description: Skips results, allowing the client to request paged result sets.
Limits the size of the result set.
Filters Identity Display Names. Requires a three character minimum.
Filters Identity Display Ids. Requires a three character minimum.
Filters Identity Entities. Requires a three character minimum.
Filters Identity Ids. Requires a three character minimum.
\* Private. For LogRhythm internal use only. *
\* Private. For LogRhythm internal use only. *
\* Private. For LogRhythm internal use only. *

request.description: Returns Identities based on DisplayName, Login, and Domain fields.

response.name: Returns the complete list of Identities.

The number of Identities returned in current page.

request.description:
Returns a smaller representation of Identities that only include the Display Name.

  \* Private. For LogRhythm internal use only. Used by the ARM, Message Engine, and Web Indexer. *

response.name: Returns the complete list of Identities.
Handles error condition when fetching Display Names.

query.description: A non-zero entityID of a root Entity.

request.description:
Returns a smaller representation of Identities for the Message Processing Engine (MPE),
which is only interested in the Identifiers of each Identity.

  \* Private. For LogRhythm internal use only. Used by the MPE. *

response.name: Returns the Identifiers and their parent Identities for a given rootEntityId.

query.description: A non-zero Entity ID where Identities should be created.

request.description: Updates or creates Identities for the LogRhythm TrueIdentity SyncClient to synchronize Active Directory accounts. Searches the system for existing Identities. Creates a new Identity if does not currently exist. Otherwise, updates the Identity.

response.name:
Returns the number of Identity and Account objects after bulk creation.

  \* Unstable, may change in a future release. *

request.description:
